title: can anybody type in arabic?
content:
I know there’s a designer from Egypt on here who I’ve talked to before, but I can’t remember his user name (you helped me with the arabic poem a couple of months ago, so if you read this, please contact me). I was wondering if anyone else has the ability to type arabic. I need the phrase ONE FAMILY (i think it’s AAYLEH WAHADA in arabic) typed in arabic, as outlines, so I can edit in Illustrator. I appreciate any help. Thanks!

Jason
